metadata.title: CVE-2022-41409 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Integer overflow vulnerability in pcre2test before 10.41 allows attackersto cause a denial of service or other unspecified impacts via negativeinput.

criterions.comment: pcre2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
